```{r, include = FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(
  collapse = TRUE,
  comment = "#>"
)
```

```{r}

f1 = function(n) (1+1/(n))^(n)
f2 = Vectorize(
  function(n) {
  sum(1/factorial(0:n))
})
library(dplyr)
tab1 = tibble(
  n = 0:30,
  f1 = f1(n),
  f2 = f2(n)
)


```

```{r}
library(ggplot2)
ggplot(tab1) + 
  aes(x = n) +
  xlim(0, 30) +
  geom_point(aes(y = f1, color = "f1")) +
  geom_point(aes(y = f2, color = "f2")) +
  geom_function(n = 1001, fun = f1, aes(color = "f1"), alpha = .5) +
  geom_function(n = 1001, fun = f2, aes(color = "f2"), alpha = .5)
```
